commencement du diplome: was the emanation of a group of teachers with extensive experience in the field of public and private education and in the practice of law, engineering and legal and financial arrangements and networks. The objective is to train diplomats, lawyers, financial engineers and versatile executives in different fields: legal, political, technological; financial. This diploma and certification training with the required scientific, technical and human qualities meets the requirements of the national and international labor market. Of course, BLP has signed double-course agreements allowing its students to obtain Tunisian diplomas approved by the Ministry of Higher Education and to continue with our partners in Europe and Asia to obtain diplomas from partner universities.

pole technologique: Al Ghazella Technology Center, in the process of ISO 9001 and ISO 21001 certification, School of Law, Political Sciences, Management and Legal and Financial Engineering. It is founded in collaboration with the Euro-Mediterranean Network for Education and Research in Economics, Technology and Management, REMEREG. It is part of the Network and presents several partners in Tunisia and around the world including REMEREG and the Mediterranean University. The latter since 2005; has succeeded in obtaining wide worldwide recognition (+100 partners and courses)
